title.rendered: Air Tahiti Nui Airlines in Auckland, New Zealand

content.rendered:
Air Tahiti Nui is a French airline with its head office in Papeete, Tahiti. Air Tahiti Nui was established on 31 October 1996 and commenced flight operations on 20 November 1998. It is the first international airline based in Papeete, Tahiti, formed to develop inbound tourism. The government of French Polynesia is the major shareholder (84.4%) along with other local investors. Currently, Air Tahiti Nui has 782 employees. It operates long-haul flights from its home base at Faa’a International Airport. 

 

Air Tahiti Nui Airline office in Auckland, New Zealand Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Customer Call Centre

Phone: +64 (9) 869 6840
Email: tnres.nz@airtahitinui.com
Business hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00am to 7:00pm

Travel Agents

Phone: +64 (9) 869 6841
Email: tnagents.nz@airtahitinui.com

Auckland Sales Office

Address: Crombie Lockwood Tower,
Level 20
191 Queen Street, Auckland 1010
Business hours: Mon-Fri 9:00am to 5:00pm

Postal Address

Address: PO Box 296
Shortland Street
Auckland 1140

Freight Service

To ship freight from New Zealand, you will need the services of an approved forwarder. The contact details below should be passed on to the freight forwarder for the freight booking.

Address: C/O ACP Worldwide Ltd.
Phone: +(64) 9 255 5365

Auckland International Airport

Business hours: Mon-Fri 8.30am to 5pm

Air Tahiti Nui Airlines Official website : https://www.airtahitinui.com/nz-en/

Air Tahiti Nui Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Air Tahiti Nui Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Tahiti Nui Airlines

Fleet size: 04

  • Boeing 787-9

List of Air Tahiti Nui Airlines Offices worldwide

Special Assistance in Air Tahiti Nui Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Air Tahiti Nui Airlines

  • Air Tahiti Nui accepts pregnant women without restrictions until the 6th month of pregnancy.
  • From the 30th to 35th week of pregnancy, a medical certificate issued within 7 days before the travel date is mandatory.
  • Beyond the 35th week of pregnancy, a pregnant woman cannot be accepted on board.

Traveling with Pets in Air Tahiti Nui Airlines

  • Only cats and dogs are allowed in Air Tahiti Nui Airlines (for other animal, please contact our Cargo Service)

For more details: https://www.airtahitinui.com/nz-en/special-assistance

Queries handled by Air Tahiti Nui Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Club Tiare

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Tahiti Nui Airlines in Auckland, New Zealand Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Tahiti Nui Airlines in Auckland, New Zealand: (click on the stars below)
